banner_title: Refer Friends And Earn Crypto Together.
banner_desc: For every friend you refer, you and your friend will each get {{lutPrize}} and also get {{rebateAmount}} when your friend makes a bet.
overview_tips: The total bet payout is the amount of paid bets settled in full currency converted to USDT. The following amount is for reference only. The actual amount received shall prevail.
links_nums: Number of Referral Links left to be created: {{nums}}
how_desc1: You will receive the Referral Reward when a valid bet is made by your friend who has registered through your Referral Link.
how_desc2: Refer your friends to join Bitgame now and share the rewards!
how_subdesc1: Login to your Bitgame account and share your exclusive Referral Code/Link to your friends
how_subtitle2: Both you and your friends will get LUT Reward for the first bet
how_subdesc2: For every friend you refer, you and your friend will receive {{lutPrize}} for his/her first valid bet.
how_subtitle3: Get USDT rewards when your friend bets
how_subdesc3: For every valid bet of {{betDivisor}} your friend makes, you will receive {{rebateAmount}}, up to {{rebateLimit}}
join_title: Want to have a share of platform profits for life?
input_remark: Please enter comments for Referral Link
faq_q1: Can I get Referral Reward if my friend did not use my Referral Code/Link to register an account?
faq_a1: Since the user did not use your Referral Code/Link, the user will not be considered as your referred friend and you will not get Referral Reward.
faq_q2: Can I get Referral Reward if my referred friend registers before 2022/01/18 02:00 (UTC 0)?
faq_a2: You will not be able to receive Referral Reward this time if your friend registers before 2022/01/18 02:00 (UTC 0).
faq_q3: What is included in Referral Reward?
faq_a3: You and your friend will each receive a {{lutPrize}} LUT Reward after your friend registers and a {{rebateAmount}} USDT Reward after your friend makes a valid bet.
faq_q4: How do I get LUT Reward?
faq_a4: When your friend registers a Bitgame platform account via your exclusive Referral Code/Link and makes his/her first paid bet (Amount of Bet ≥ {{firstBet}} USDT Equivalent), both you and your friend will receive a {{lutPrize}} LUT Reward.
faq_q5: How do I get USDT Reward?
faq_a5: For every paid valid bet of {{betDivisor}} USDT made by your friend who has registered a platform account through your exclusive Referral Code/Link, you will receive {{rebateAmount}} USDT Reward, up to {{singleLimit}} USDT for a single friend, up to a maximum of {{rebateLimit}} USDT. The reward will be issued to your account within 24 hours after your friend completes the required amount of valid bets.
faq_q6: Is there a withdrawal limit for Referral Reward?
faq_a6: LUT Reward can be withdrawn whenever the minimum withdrawal requirement is fulfilled; USDT Reward can only be withdrawn when it becomes {{flowRate}} times the effective bet amount.
login_desc: In addition to {{lutPrize}} for both of you, you will also get {{rebateLimit}} after your referral completes the betting requirements! Invite friends, share rewards!
tips_limit: Referral link numbers reach the upper limit
share: Register with my referral link and bag LUT token rewards! And get refunded your stake on all sports and gaming bets! My referral code: {{code}}
